import React from 'react'; import { withRouter, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { observer } from 'mobx-react' import { Layout, Menu, Icon } from 'antd' import MenuStore from '../store/MenuStore' const { Sider } = Layout // const { SubMenu } = Menu const LeftNav = (props) => { let { state: { collapsed } } = MenuStore console.log('Top collapsed: LeftNav >>>>>', collapsed) console.log(props.location ? props.location.pathname : '=====') let loadMenuStyle = menu => { if (menu(props.location.pathname)) { return 'active' } else { return '' } } return (
{/* */} Dashboard Manage News Email List {/* Team} > Team 1 Team 2 Team 3 */}
) } export default withRouter(observer(LeftNav))
